item.description:
hi everyone,

wednesday's weather forecast looks good: sunny and mid-60's. let's take advantage of that by getting together for an after work skate along the charles river in boston.

we'll meet at the DCR Hatch Memorial Shell at 5:45 p.m. and after chatting a bit, we'll start skating at about 6 p.m. see here for a DCR page with directions to the Hatch Shell: http://www.mass.gov/d...

i'll be either directly in front of the hatch shell or over by the snack bar/refreshment stand. i look pretty much like my picture and although i'll be wearing either a baseball cap or my helmet (if i can find it), if i'm just lounging around without a hat, look for a big shaved head. <-8

as noted above, i'll also email my cell # to anyone who RSVPs 'Yes' by 3 p.m. wednesday.

this is a skating event for all skill levels, so come on out and meet other skaters. in general my skating events will be for all comers. i'll hang with 'the pack' (if there is one) and you're welcome to come and go as you please.

we'll just skate along the river for an hour or so (sunset will be at about 7:50 p.m.) and see how it goes for everyone.

hope to see you on wednesday!

pwl
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to all 'Yes' RSVPers wednesday afternoon @ 3 p.m.
item.name: After Work Skate: Let's meet at the DCR Hatch Memorial Shell to skate
